amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the National Science Foundation by 0.5 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce each of the amounts authorized to be appropriated or made available by 0.5 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 126 - 292 (Roll no. 291).
